content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 1, Ponferradina 0.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 1, Ponferradina 0.
Hand ball by Michael Pereira (Mallorca).
Attempt saved. Andy (Ponferradina) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan Ruiz with a cross.
Pedro Bigas (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Rubén Sobrino (Ponferradina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pedro Bigas (Mallorca).

Substitution, Ponferradina. Acorán replaces Pablo Infante.
Attempt missed. Héctor Yuste (Mallorca) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Javi Ros with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Javier Carpio.
